stvn-smm.title: Social Media Manager
stvn-smm.description: We're looking for someone who will keep our social media for ScytedTV News updated for new shorts and video releases.

stvn-sw.title: Shorts Writer
stvn-sw.description: We need someone to write the stories for our shorts, as well as adapt our longer-form stories into shorts.

stvn-naa.title: News Article Adaptation
stvn-naa.description: We need someone who can adapt our stories into news articles on our website.
